name: Edward F. LAMOLINARA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE
name_abbreviation: Lamolinara v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania State Police

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Edward F. LAMOLINARA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order, 51 Pa.Cmwlth. 570, 414 A.2d 1126, affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence J. Neary, Harrisburg, for appellant.
John L. Heaton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1154
Edward F. LAMOLINARA, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 20, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Lawrence J. Neary, Harrisburg, for appellant.
John L. Heaton, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
